testcase.classname: register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully

testcase.classname: Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with valid data.............................................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd".....................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.name: user chooses euro currency
testcase.system-out: When user chooses euro currency.............................................passed Then featured products are in euro..........................................passed

testcase.name: user click on nokia slider
testcase.failure:
